entry.title: Combined summary - This list...
entry.summary: The conversation being discussed seems to be getting off track due to the presence of trolls. The author of the discussion notes that the list is becoming similar to Bitcointalk, which is infamous for its abundance of internet trolls. Therefore, the author expresses a desire to steer the conversation back towards its original purpose and avoid any distractions caused by these trolls. It is crucial to maintain a productive and respectful dialogue in order to achieve the goals of the discussion.
